reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 137/97: BURLEY TOBACCO - DISSOLUTION  OF LOCAL BOARD
reg_info.reg_name_text: BURLEY TOBACCO — DISSOLUTION OF LOCAL BOARD
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 137/97: BURLEY TOBACCO - DISSOLUTION  OF LOCAL BOARD

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “local board” means The Ontario Burley Tobacco Growers’ Marketing Board. O. Reg. 137/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“local board” means The Ontario Burley Tobacco Growers’ Marketing Board. O. Reg. 137/97, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The local board shall donate the money standing to its credit to the Access Program at the Ridgetown College of Agricultural Technology for scholarships to crop science students in the name of the local board. O. Reg. 137/97, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The local board shall donate the money standing to its credit to the Access Program at the Ridgetown College of Agricultural Technology for scholarships to crop science students in the name of the local board. O. Reg. 137/97, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The local board is dissolved. O. Reg. 137/97, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The local board is dissolved. O. Reg. 137/97, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 137/97, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 137/97, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 137/97, s. 5. Français
content.raw_html:
5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 137/97, s. 5.

Français
